author: undetermined
full_text:
I apologize, but this HTML content appears to be a website template for an elder care helpline service (Elderline) and does not contain a fact-check article. The HTML includes website navigation, banner images, service descriptions, and footer information, but no actual fact-checking content.

The page seems to be for the National Helpline for Senior Citizens in India, with details about their services, contact information, and statistics about their work. If you intended to provide a fact-check article for analysis, you may want to re-upload the correct HTML content.
title: Elder Line 14567 is a toll-free number operational from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM, that provides free information, guidance, emotional support, field intervention in cases of abuse, rescues and reunion of homeless elderly driven by values of Consistency, Care, Empathy and Encouragement.
vclaim: Elder Line 14567 is a toll-free number operational from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM, that provides free information, guidance, emotional support, field intervention in cases of abuse, rescues and reunion of homeless elderly driven by values of Consistency, Care, Empathy and Encouragement.
